trends: There have been no other sightings in Ashburton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailssighting report: first sighting december 13th 1998 this was a crystal clear night and a craft passed over our window twice along with a satelite travelling in a different trajectory but at the same speed. the craft had an illuminated outer rim with four large round white lights in a straight line underside. i will submit an image that i have created as it is difficult to describe. second sighting september 2000 this was a close encounter the craft passed across a valley and directly over our heads. this craft was illuminated on all edges and very large at around eight o clock in the evening with clear skys and little wind. this craft was cubic and l-shaped as large as a jumbo jet. it had a slight protrusion at the rear with three balconies above. within the protrusion at the rear were mesh dishes which were emitting a blue\purple light - this seemed to be propelling the craft at around 40miles an hour (estimated). underside the craft had three large white lights two at its tall end and one at the other. these were joined by huge pipes. the craft was so close we could see the bolts on the pipework. the craft emitted an electrical humming noise which was not loud although it sounded very powerfull. it is now five years on and i find myself asking are they somewhere on dartmoor? are they still here? were they landing or leaving? there are plenty of places on dartmoor to hide a craft that size. my pictures are made with my computer so do not do justice to the ufo s we have seen with our own eyes. i beleive we have seen the future - imagine a world without the wheel.
